memo: 通过基板生产车间中导入AI技术，发现浪费并改善
title: 通过基板生产车间中导入AI技术，发现浪费并改善
description:
接下来，介绍使用搭载三菱电机独家的AI技术“Maisart”的节能分析诊断软件 EcoAdviser 的节能和业务改善实例。

AI 技术分析从生产现场收集的大量数据，从多条生产线中识别出需要改进的生产线，然后再从该生产线中找出需要改进的工序，进行重新研讨工序等，从而实现节能改善。
通过AI技术找出人为难以发现的改善点，从而实现改善。

↓↓↓点击查看产品详细信息↓↓↓
Mitsubishi Electric Global FA site
https://www.mitsubishielectric.com/fa/

Mitsubishi Electric Global FA site_Energy Saving Support Software EcoAdviser
https://www.mitsubishielectric.com/fa/products/pmng/ems/smerit/eap/eap_2.html

memo: 在测量用变压器和互感器制造工厂利用AI进行节能改善
title: 在测量用变压器和互感器制造工厂利用AI进行节能改善
description:
我们将介绍在三菱电机福山制作所的测量用变压器和互感器生产设备中使用节能支援软件 EcoAdviser 的事例。

从制造设备收集的信息通过 EcoAdviser 的图形创建功能进行可视化，以识别使用大量能源的设备，并使用 AI 诊断功能查找需要改善的点,以供节能改善。

EcoAdviser搭载AI技术Maisart，从掌握现状、抽出能源浪费、诊断要因到评估节能措施的有效性，为节能活动提供全方位支持。

title: 在断路器装配车间通过使用 EcoAdviser 可视化，进行改善
description:
将通过生产工序中的各控制柜里设置的可编程控制器收集的生产信息和用能量测量仪测量的电能使用信息，用上位的EcoWebServerⅢ集中管理，使用EcoAdviser 进行可视化和分析。

title: 能源原单位管理的节能活动

memo: 通过改善断路器装配车间设备的突然停机来提高生产率
title: 通过改善断路器装配车间设备的突然停机来提高生产率
description: 生产工程中安装在每个控制柜里的可编程控制器收集有关设备突发停机次数和突然停机原因的信息。\n通过对收集数据进行可视化和分析，进行改善突然停机问题，从而实现提高生产力。

memo: 基于需求管理的写字楼节能活动
节能支援软件(AI版)的介绍 02
title: 节能支援软件(AI版)的介绍 02
description:
节能支持软件EcoAdviser（型号：MES3-EAP1-AI）使用三菱电机的Maisart人工智能（AI）技术来实现高效节能，例如抽出能量浪费，诊断潜在能量浪费要因并进行评估节能措施的效果等。
在此视频中，我们将介绍在三菱电机某工厂一条生产线上使用EcoAdviser主要功能的示例。

‣ Energy Saving Support Software EcoAdviser
https://www.mitsubishielectric.com/fa/products/pmng/ems/smerit/eap/eap_2.html?youtube-ai_introduction_02cn

memo: 遮断器組立工場へのEcoAdviserを用いた指標グラフの見える化による業務改善
title: 遮断器組立工場へのEcoAdviserを用いた指標グラフの見える化による業務改善
description:
生産工程の各制御盤に設置したシーケンサで収集した生産情報、エネルギー計測ユニットで計測した電力使用情報を、上位のEcoServerで一元管理し、見える化・分析ツールとしてEcoAdviserを活用しています。
現場で働く作業者に生産状況を分かりやすく見せることで業務改革を行っている取組です。

memo: 基板製造工場へのAI活用による無駄発見で業務改善
title: 基板製造工場へのAI活用による無駄発見で業務改善
description:
三菱電機独自のAI技術「Maisart」を搭載した省エネ分析・診断アプリケーションEcoAdviserを活用した省エネ・業務改善事例を紹介します。

生産現場から収集した膨大なデータをAIで分析し、複数あるラインの中から改善すべきライン、さらにはそのラインの中で改善すべき工程まで見つけ、業務見直しすることで省エネ改善を図っています。
人手では探すことが難しかった改善ポイントをAIで見つけ、業務改善まで行った取組です。

memo: 計器用変成器製造工場でのAI活用による省エネ改善
title: 計器用変成器製造工場でのAI活用による省エネ改善
description:
省エネ分析・診断アプリケーション EcoAdviserを当社福山製作所 計器用変成器製造工場で活用した事例をご紹介いたします。

製造設備から収集した情報をEcoAdviserのグラフ作成機能で可視化し、エネルギーを多く使っている設備を特定、また、AI診断機能を活用し、改善すべきポイントを見つけ、省エネ改善を図っています。

EcoAdviserはAI技術 Maisartを搭載し、現状把握からエネルギーロスの抽出・要因診断、省エネ対策の効果検証に至るまでの省エネ活動をトータルサポートします。

memo: 現場の省エネをAIがアシスト！脱炭素社会の実現に貢献！
title: 現場の省エネをAIがアシスト！脱炭素社会の実現に貢献！
description: AI技術Maisartを搭載し、現状把握からエネルギーロスの抽出・要因診断、省エネ対策の効果検証に至るまでの省エネ活動をトータルサポートする省エネ分析・診断アプリケーションEcoAdviserをご紹介いたします。

memo: Business improvement utilizing AI at the board manufacturing factory
title: Business improvement utilizing AI at the board manufacturing factory
description:
Introducing examples of energy saving and business improvement using EcoAdviser, an energy saving analysis and diagnosis application equipped with Mitsubishi Electric's original AI technology DQMaisartDQ.

AI technology analyzes a large amount of data collected from the production site, identifies the production line that needs improvement from multiple production lines, and then finds the project that needs improvement in the production line.
We are improving energy conservation by reviewing the operation of projects that should be improved.
This is an example of an effort to improve operations by finding improvement points that were difficult to find by human hands with AI technology.

↓ ↓ ↓ Click here for product details ↓ ↓ ↓
Mitsubishi Electric Global FA site
https://www.mitsubishielectric.com/fa/

Mitsubishi Electric Global FA site_Energy Saving Support Software EcoAdviser
https://www.mitsubishielectric.com/fa/products/pmng/ems/smerit/eap/eap_2.html

memo: Introduction_02 of Energy Saving Support Software EcoAdviser (MES3-EAP1-AI) _English
title: Introduction_02 of Energy Saving Support Software EcoAdviser (MES3-EAP1-AI) _English
description:
Energy Saving Support Software EcoAdviser(Model:MES3-EAP1-AI) uses Mitsubishi Electric’s Maisart-branded artificial-intelligence (AI) technology for highly effective energy-saving functions, such as identifying energy losses, diagnosing potential energy-loss factors and quantifying the expected effects of energy-saving measures. 
In this video, we will introduce an example of Mitsubishi Electric's production line using EcoAdviser's key functions.

‣Energy Saving Support Software EcoAdviser
https://www.mitsubishielectric.com/fa/products/pmng/ems/smerit/eap/eap_2.html?youtube-ai_introduction_02en

memo: Energy saving efforts for office buildings by demand management
Efforts to improve productivity by improving the minor stoppage of equipment
title: Efforts to improve productivity by improving the minor stoppage of equipment
description: The Programmable Logic Controllers we installed on each control panel in the production process collect information on the number of minor stoppage of equipment and the cause of minor stoppage.\nWe are working to improve productivity by visualizing and analyzing the collected data to improve the minor stoppage.

memo: Energy saving efforts by energy consumption management
title: Energy saving efforts by energy consumption management
description:
The power usage status used when assembling one product is visualized for each process, and the original unit is used as an index.
Through this original unit management, wasteful power usage is clarified and energy saving efforts are being made.

memo: Business improvement by visualization using EcoAdviser in circuit breaker assembly plant
title: Business improvement by visualization using EcoAdviser in circuit breaker assembly plant
description:
EcoWebServer III centrally manages and visualizes the production information collected by the Programmable Logic Controllers installed in each control panel of the production process and the power usage information measured by the energy measurement unit. In addition, we use EcoAdviser as an analysis tool.

memo: Energy saving improvement by utilizing AI at instrument transformer manufacturing factory
title: Energy saving improvement by utilizing AI at instrument transformer manufacturing factory
description:
We are going to introduce a case study of using the Energy Saving Support Software EcoAdviser in the manufacturing facility for instrument transformers at Mitsubishi Electric’s Fukuyama Works.

The data collected from manufacturing equipment are visualized with EcoAdviser's graph creation function in order to identify equipment that uses a lot of energy.
Furthermore, AI diagnostic function helps us to find points that should be improved to boost our energy saving activities.

EcoAdviser is equipped with AI technology Maisart, and provides total support for energy-saving activities, i.e., grasping the current situation, extracting energy-loss, diagnosing loss-factors, and verifying the result of energy saving countermeasures.
